name: Dicast: Rules of Chaos
description:
Pick your Hero, select your Base and get ready for battle.
Use extraordinary dice-cards and plan your moves strategically to drain your opponent’s HP and win the match!
Unlock and upgrade Heroes with powerful super abilities.
Purchase and collect unique skins to stand out and show off on the board.
Become a master of the leaderboard and rule them all!
■ BATTLE IN EPIC DUELS
Face opponents from all around the world in exciting 1vs.1 battles on board.
Fight monsters and cross your base to level up your Hero. Defeat the enemy and collect awesome rewards!
■CREATE YOUR UNIQUE STRATEGY
Combine different Heroes and Bases with various deck settings to discover the best winning strategy. Build a unique deck of special cards and surprise your opponents at every turn!
■UNLOCK AND UPGRADE HEROES
Collect and upgrade a variety of Heroes with exclusive battle skills and equipment. Produce equipment at the Base to power up your Heroes and collect unique skins to stand out.
■RULE THE CHAOS
Discover dice cards to control your destiny! No more random luck-based throws to determine the winner – the fate of the game lies in your hands (literally!). With dice cards, you can decide where your Hero goes next and plan the moves strategically.
■BECOME THE GRANDMASTER
Climb the global leaderboards to prove you’re the greatest Dice Master of them all!
■CONSTANTLY EVOLVING
Look out for new Heroes, Bases, skins, equipment, special events and team contents in the future!
■GAME FEATURES
- Fight in real-time turn-based duels on board against players from across the world
- Enjoy the innovative battle system with match-based character growth and dice-cards to control your moves
- Climb to the top of the Global leaderboard and friendly rankings
- Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect and upgrade powerful new cards
- Aim for consecutive victories to earn Victory Keys
- Unlock and collect new, mighty Heroes – each with a signature set of skills and equipment
- Complete achievements to discover new cards and build the ultimate deck
- Open and upgrade new Bases with unique abilities and equipment production features
- Use equipment to make your Heroes even more powerful and dominate the battle board
- Discover different worlds as you progress up the leagues
- Invite your friends to private battles and see who’s the best dice master
PLEASE NOTE! Dicast: Rules of Chaos is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Dicast: Rules of Chaos.
